data.name: Omitted
data.detailed_description:
"Omitted" is a first person psychological horror. The game takes place in an old abandoned hospital.

Environment

An abandoned hospital from 1917 filled with omitted patients. The player will have to go through the dark hallways and pass next to the patients in order to regain his memory about why he is here and what is actually happening.

Storyline

There is more than meets the eye when it comes to this abandoned hospital the players finds themselves in. Understanding and discovering the story will be key to beating it. There will be dark events, ideas, and a lot to discover.

Gameplay

There are puzzles and situations that the players will need to solve and maneuver around in order to reach their goals.

WARNING:

Epileptic seizures associated with increased sensitivity to light are Possible. Some people may experience seizures when exposed to flashes of light and flashing images that appear in a video game. People who have not previously experienced such attacks may not be aware of their illness. A reasonable restriction of the game audience is recommended.

data.short_description: Omitted is a first-person psychological horror game. Experience being left alone in an old hospital, discover its secrets and try to survive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scary scenes that may seem disturbing to some players. The scenes aren't suitable for viewer under 18.
